tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Wait time,
review: Dr. Anuja Agarwal is not only a dedicated doctor but also quite a friendly kind of a person. She has good communication skills along with an ability to form good rapport with her patients. Meeting her helps one to understand the proper meaning of professionalism. The best part about her is her ability to tackle even the most tricky case with utmost ease. Treatment with minimal trauma is another plus point about her. I would especially recommend her because of her professionalism, knowledge, ability to conduct pain-free treatment without lengthy appointments and good time management. Do visit her.

review:
If you are afraid of injections and blood, like me. Believe me she is the best. She extracted and implanted my molar teeth in 5-7 mins and only thing I noticed was her comic timing. 

If you are really afraid of doctors and procedures, you should definitely give her a visit.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: Amazing doctor!! Very professional attitude with good nature. The clinic is also good and clean. I am very afraid of surgeries and implants. But here you just need 1 day off from ur work and then surgery is done with in 20-30 minutes. Good caring doctor, I obviously recommend everyone to pay a visit for your dental problems. You will get the best solutions
